revision.text:
{{Infobox road |state=LA |type=LA |route=938 |length_mi=2.36 |length_round=2 |established= |direction_a=West |direction_b=East |terminus_a={{jct|state=LA|LA|74}} north of [[Gonzales, Louisiana|Gonzales]] |terminus_b={{jct|state=LA|LA|44}} in [[Gonzales, Louisiana|Gonzales]] |parishes=[[Ascension Parish, Louisiana|Ascension]] |previous_type=LA |previous_route=937 |next_type=LA |next_route=939 }} '''Louisiana Highway 938''' ('''LA 938''') is [[state highway]] in [[Louisiana]] that serves [[Ascension Parish, Louisiana|Ascension Parish]]. It spans {{convert|2.36|mi|km}} in a west to east direction. It is known locally as Coontrap Road and West New River Street.
==Route description== From the west, LA 938 begins at [[Louisiana Highway 74|LA 74]] north of [[Gonzales, Louisiana|Gonzales]]. It heads south and then east along Coontrap Road before turning south at West New River Street. West New River Street then turns east where it meets the [[New River (Louisiana)|New River]]. It continues east to a terminus at a junction with [[Louisiana Highway 44|LA 44]] (North Burnside Avenue).
LA 938 is an undivided, two lane highway for its entire length.
==Major junctions== {{LAinttop|Parish|parish=Ascension|location=Gonzales}} {{LAint |mile=0.00 |road={{jct|state=LA|LA|74}} |notes=Western terminus}} {{LAint |mile=2.36 |road={{jct|state=LA|LA|44|name1=North Burnside Avenue}} |notes=Eastern terminus}} {{jctbtm}}
